content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: jungle_slab
inventory=[{"type": "green_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "brown_terracotta", "quantity": 15, "index": 14}, {"type": "crimson_pressure_plate", "quantity": 37, "index": 15}, {"type": "chain", "quantity": 39, "index": 17}, {"type": "netherite_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "damaged_anvil", "quantity": 18, "index": 21}, {"type": "salmon_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "mushroom_stem", "quantity": 43, "index": 24}, {"type": "stray_spawn_egg", "quantity": 12, "index": 25}, {"type": "stripped_jungle_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "prismarine_crystals", "quantity": 7, "index": 34}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 59, "index": 37}, {"type": "dolphin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 22, "index": 38}, {"type": "pink_banner", "quantity": 14, "index": 39}, {"type": "dark_oak_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}, {"type": "spruce_button", "quantity": 4, "index": 41}, {"type": "mojang_banner_pattern", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}]
thought: To craft jungle_slab, I need to craft jungle_planks first. To do that, I need to move the stripped_jungle_wood from slot 32 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 32 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: jungle_slab
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_jungle_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "green_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "brown_terracotta", "quantity": 15, "index": 14}, {"type": "crimson_pressure_plate", "quantity": 37, "index": 15}, {"type": "chain", "quantity": 39, "index": 17}, {"type": "netherite_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "damaged_anvil", "quantity": 18, "index": 21}, {"type": "salmon_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "mushroom_stem", "quantity": 43, "index": 24}, {"type": "stray_spawn_egg", "quantity": 12, "index": 25}, {"type": "prismarine_crystals", "quantity": 7, "index": 34}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 59, "index": 37}, {"type": "dolphin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 22, "index": 38}, {"type": "pink_banner", "quantity": 14, "index": 39}, {"type": "dark_oak_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}, {"type": "spruce_button", "quantity": 4, "index": 41}, {"type": "mojang_banner_pattern", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}]
thought: Now I have the jungle_planks, I can move them to an empty slot (eg., 11) to free up the crafting table.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4
